data.actual_result: When the song ends, you remain in the listening party, but your status is stuck at the end of that song
data.expected_result: Either the correct host is shown and your status updates when the song ends, or you leave the party when the user that created the invite leaves
data.short_description: Joining a Spotify listening party through a party invite from a listener shows that listener as the host, and breaks your listening party when the user leaves (Requires Spotify Premium)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have two or more people in a Spotify listening party - Have someone other than the host send an invite to the party - Join the listening party via that invite - During a song, have the user who made the invite leave the party - Wait for the song to end and watch the listening party status and your Spotify status
